channel.title: CW IW Bug on Hunter Bear
channel.description:
![CW Possible Bug|690x255](upload://2LYUOErtAIqMcKbJ0ZdwjH8BoU9.png)
I was playing Court Wizard and I chose to ice ward a hunter. I did not get attacked, nor did I get possessed, and from what I heard from the possessor, he had not possessed myself or the hunter, and I ended up being killed by the hunter's bear trap.
If I really was killed icewarding this hunter, I believe that's a bug.

item.title: CW IW Bug on Hunter Bear
item.dc:creator: Toldea
item.description:
I have also experienced this bug. Chat log recap of events.

https://imgur.com/a/Uka8w

Read full topic
